name: Ellibot WooCommerce Slider
author: Ellibot

sections.description:
Use the Ellibot WooCommerce Slider plugin to show featured products in your WooCommerce shop.

Note: Yoy need the WooCommerce plugin installed for this extension to work.

Full custom style You can completely control the look of the slider to fit the rest of your web content.

Shortcode Use our shortcode to easily choose where you want to view the slider.

Features

  • Full resposive design
  • Swipe navigation
  • Easy to set up
  • Easy to use

Links

  • Website
  • Documentation
  • Demos
  • Support
  • EWC PRO

PRO

The Ellibot WooCommerce Slider plugin is also available in a professional version which includes more settings, more functionality, and more flexibility! Learn more

Install from your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit Plugins > Add New
  2. Search for “Ellibot WooCommerce Slider”
  3. Activate Ellibot WooCommerce Slider from your Plugins page
  4. Add slides by selecting featured products in WooCommerce plugin.
  5. Change settings by clicking on the new menu item “Ellibot WC Slider”.

Install manual

  1. Upload the Ellibot WooCommerce Slider folder to the plugins directory in your WordPress installation.
  2. Activate Ellibot WooCommerce Slider from your Plugins page
  3. Add slides by selecting featured products in WooCommerce plugin.
  4. Change settings by clicking on the new menu item “Ellibot WC Slider”.
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Fix: Fixed an issue when a browser window blur

1.0

  • Launched the Ellibot WooCommerce Slider!
